name: nationalmap
description: Geospatial visualization application for Australian government and open data.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Installation with NPM successful. What to do next:\n  npm start       # Starts the server on port 3001\n  gulp watch      # Builds NationalMap and dependencies, and rebuilds if files change.'
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run reinstall-northern-australia && npm run deploy-without-reinstall
scripts.deploy-without-reinstall: gulp clean && gulp release && npm run build-northern-australia && npm run deploy-current
scripts.deploy-current: npm run copy-northern-australia && npm run get-deploy-overrides && gulp make-package --serverConfigOverride ./privateserverconfig.json --clientConfigOverride ./wwwroot/privateconfig.json && cd deploy/aws && ./stack create && cd ../.. && rm -rf wwwroot/northernaustralia
scripts.get-deploy-overrides: aws s3 --profile $npm_package_config_awsProfile cp $npm_package_config_awsS3ServerConfigOverridePath ./privateserverconfig.json && aws s3 --profile $npm_package_config_awsProfile cp $npm_package_config_awsS3ClientConfigOverridePath ./wwwroot/privateconfig.json
scripts.reinstall-northern-australia: if [ -d $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath ]; then ORIGINAL_DIR=$PWD && cd $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd $ORIGINAL_DIR; fi
scripts.build-northern-australia: if [ -d $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath ]; then ORIGINAL_DIR=$PWD && cd $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath && rm -rf wwwroot/build && gulp release && cd $ORIGINAL_DIR; fi
scripts.copy-northern-australia: if [ -d $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath ]; then mkdir -p wwwroot/northernaustralia && cp -r $npm_package_config_northernAustraliaPath/wwwroot/* wwwroot/northernaustralia/; fi
